test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (pickup X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave)))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y microwave)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y cupboard)))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y desk))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X green) (sort Y plant))) )
test.nl: Do not pick up the blue bottle in microwave. Do not pick up the red book. The blue can must in the microwave. There must be a yellow book in cupboard. Close the microwave. Put a book in microwave. Put a can on the desk. Put a green remotecontrol on the plant.
